verses.1: Mi khempeuh aw, na khut uh beeng un! Lungdamna la nakpi-in sa-in Pasian phat un.
verses.2: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa, a Sangpen pa, dipkuathuai a, leitung khempeuh a uk kumpi lian khat ahi hi.
verses.3: Mi khempeuh eima nuai ah, minamte i khe nuai ah amah in hong zawhsak hi.
verses.4: Ama it Israel-teʼ angtan pih eima luah ding leitang amah in hong teelsak hi.
verses.5: Awging tawh Pasian pai to a, peengkul aw tawh Topa pai to hi.
verses.6: Pasian tungah phatna la sa un, phatna la sa un! I Kumpipa tungah phatna la sa un, phatna la sa un!
verses.7: Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian pen leitung khempeuhteʼ kumpi ahi hi. La sakna tawh amah phat un!
verses.8: Pasian in minamte uk a, a tokhom siangtho tungah Pasian tu hi.
verses.9: Uliante le Abrahamʼ Pasianʼ mite kipawl khawm uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung miteʼ lumte khempeuh Pasian-aʼ suak khinta a, amah a sangpi-in kithangsak hi.
